short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The official extension for home.diy, add all of your DIY project resources in just one-click of a button on any web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No more trying to track down previous articles, tutorial videos or products needed to complete your DIY project. Now you can easily add every useful resource you come across during your research with this extension and have them all in one place on home.diy

Share your projects with others and explore a new way to DIY!
